description: An element that is referable by its idShort. This id is not globally unique. This id is unique within the name space of the element.
title: Referable
$comment: According Platform Industrie 4.0. Details of Asset Administration Shell (Version 3.0) Part 1 Release Candidate 02

links.dtdl:name: displayName
links.dtdl:description: Display name. Can be provided in several languages.

links.dtdl:name: description
links.dtdl:description: Description or comments on the element. The description can be provided in several languages.

links.dtdl:name: tags
links.x-jsonschema:$comment: Not part of the AAS meta model. Makes querying easier. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/digital-twins/how-to-use-tags

idShort.description: In case of identifiables this attribute is a short name of the element. In case of referable this id is an identifying string of the element within its name space.

category.title: Category
category.description: The category is a value that gives further meta information w.r.t. to the class of the element. It affects the expected existence of attributes and the applicability of constraints.

checksum.title: Checksum
checksum.description: Checksum to be used to determine if an Referable (including its aggregated child elements) has changed.The checksum is calculated by the userâ€™s tool environment. The checksum has no semantic meaning for an Asset Administration Shell model and there is no requirement for Asset Administration Shell tools to manage the checksum.
